name: Daryabadi
text: Ya-Sin.

name: Daryabadi
text: By the Qur'an full of wisdom.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily thou art of the sent ones,

name: Daryabadi
text: upon the straight path.

name: Daryabadi
text: This is a revelation of the Mighty, the Merciful.

name: Daryabadi
text: That thou mayest warn a people whose fathers were not warned; so they are negligent.

name: Daryabadi
text: Assuredly the word hath been justified against most of them, wherefore they shall not believe.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily We have placed on their necks shackles which are up to the chins; so that their heads are forced up.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We have placed before them a barrier and behind them a barrier, so We have covered them, so that they see not.

name: Daryabadi
text: And it is alike Unto them, whather thou warnest them or warnest them not; they shall not believe.

name: Daryabadi
text: Thou canst warn only him who followeth the admonition and feareth the Compassionate, unseen. So bear thou Unto him the glad tidings of forgiveness and a generous hire.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily We! We shall guicken the dead. And We write down that which they send before and their footsteps. And everything We have counted up in a Book luminous.

name: Daryabadi
text: And propound thou Unto them the similitude of the inhabitants of a town, When there came thereto the sent ones;

name: Daryabadi
text: What time We sent Unto them two, then they belied the twain, wherefore We strengthened them with a third, and they said: verily we are Unto you the sent ones.

name: Daryabadi
text: They said: ye are but human beings like ourselves; the Compassionate hath not sent down aught; ye are only lying.

name: Daryabadi
text: They said: our Lord knoweth that we are surely Unto you the sent ones.

name: Daryabadi
text: And on us is naught but manifest preaching.

name: Daryabadi
text: They said: verily we augur ill of you; if ye desist not, we shall surely stone you, and there will befall you from us a torment afflictive.

name: Daryabadi
text: They said: your evil augury be with you. Call ye it an ill- luck because ye are admonished! Aye! ye are a people extravagant.

name: Daryabadi
text: And there came from the farthest part of the town a man running. He said; O my people! follow the sent ones.

name: Daryabadi
text: Follow those who ask not of you any hire, and who are rightly guided.

name: Daryabadi
text: And what aileth me that I should not worship Him who hath created me, and Unto whom ye shall be returned.

name: Daryabadi
text: Shall I take beside Him gods when, if the Compassionate should intend me any harm, their intercession will avail me not at all, nor would they save me?

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily then I should be in error manifest.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily I believe now in your Lord; so hearken Unto me."

name: Daryabadi
text: It was said: enter thou the Garden. He said: would that my people knew.

name: Daryabadi
text: That my Lord hath forgiven me, and hath made me of the honoured ones.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We sent not against his people after him a host from heaven, nor have We been sending down any such.

name: Daryabadi
text: It was but one shout, and lo! they were extinct.

name: Daryabadi
text: Ah the misery of the bondmen! there cometh not: Unto them an apostle but him they have been mocking.

name: Daryabadi
text: Behold they not how many We have destroyed before them of the generations! verily Unto them they shall not return.

name: Daryabadi
text: And surely all, every one of them, shall be brought before us.

name: Daryabadi
text: And a sign Unto them is the dead land. We quicken it and therecut We bring forth grain, so that thereof they eat.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We place therein gardens of the date-palms and vines; and We therein cause to gush forth springs.

name: Daryabadi
text: That they may eat of the fruit thereof; and their hands worked it not. Will they not, therefore, give thanks?

name: Daryabadi
text: Hallowed be He who hath created all the pairs of that which the earth groweth, and of themselves and of that which they know not!

name: Daryabadi
text: And a sign Unto them is the night. We draw off the day therefrom, and lo! they are darkened.

name: Daryabadi
text: And the sun runneth to its appointed term: that is the disposition of the Mighty, the Knowing."

name: Daryabadi
text: And the moon! For it We have decreed mansions till it reverteth like the old branch of a palm-tree.

name: Daryabadi
text: It is not permitted to the sun that it should overtake the moon, nor can the night outstrip the day: each in an orbit, they float.

name: Daryabadi
text: And a sign Unto them is that We bear their offspring in a laden ship.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We have created for them of the like thereUnto whereon they ride.

name: Daryabadi
text: And if We list, We shall drown them, and there will be no shout for them, nor will they be saved.

name: Daryabadi
text: unless it be a mercy from us, and as an enjoyment for a season.

name: Daryabadi
text: And when it is said Unto them: fear that which is before you and that which is behind you, that haply ye may find mercy, they withdraw.

name: Daryabadi
text: And not a sign cometh Unto them of the signs of their Lord, but they are ever backsliders therefrom.

name: Daryabadi
text: And when it is said Unto them: expend of that wherewith Allah hath provided you, those who disbelieve say Unto those who believe: shall we feed those whom God Himself would have fed, if He listed? Ye are in naught else than error manifest.

name: Daryabadi
text: And they say: when will this promise be fulfilled if ye say sooth?

name: Daryabadi
text: They await not but one shout, which shall lay hold of them while they are yet wrangling.

name: Daryabadi
text: And they will not be able to make a disposition, nor to their family they return.

name: Daryabadi
text: And the trumpet shall be blown, and lo! from the tombs Unto their Lord they shall be hastening.

name: Daryabadi
text: They will say: Ah woe Unto us! who hath roused us from our sleeping-place? This is that which the Compassionate had promised, and truly spake the sent ones.

name: Daryabadi
text: It shall be but one shout; and lo! they shall all be brought together before us.

name: Daryabadi
text: To-day no soul will be wronged at all; nor shall ye be requited but for that which ye have been working.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily the fellows of the Garden to-day shall be happily employed.

name: Daryabadi
text: They and their spouses, in shade on couches shall be reclining.

name: Daryabadi
text: Theirs shall be fruit therein and theirs shall be whatsoever they ask for.

name: Daryabadi
text: Peace shall be the word from the Lord Merciful.

name: Daryabadi
text: And separate yourselves this Day, O ye culprits!

name: Daryabadi
text: Enjoined I not on you, ye children of Adam, that ye shall not worship the Satan - verily he is Unto you manifest foe.

name: Daryabadi
text: And that: ye shall worship Me; this is the straight path?

name: Daryabadi
text: And yet assuredly he hath led astray of you a great multitude. Wherefore reflect ye not?

name: Daryabadi
text: Yonder is Hell, which ye were promised.

name: Daryabadi
text: Roast therein To-day for that ye have been disbelieving.

name: Daryabadi
text: To-day We shall seal upon their mouths, and their hands will speak Unto us, and their feet will bear witness of that which they have been earning.

name: Daryabadi
text: And if We listed, surely We should wipe out their eyes so that they would struggle for the way how then would they see?

name: Daryabadi
text: And if We listed, surely We should transform them in their places, so that they would be able neither to go forward nor to return

name: Daryabadi
text: And whomsoever We grant long life, We reverse him in creation. Reflect then they not?

name: Daryabadi
text: And We have not taught him poetry, nor it befitteth him. This is but an admonition and a Recital luminous:

name: Daryabadi
text: In order that it may warn him who is alive, and that the sentence may be justified on the infidels.

name: Daryabadi
text: Observe they not that We have created for them, of that which Our hands have worked, cattle: so that they are their owners.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We have subdued them Unto them, so that some of them they have for riding and on some of them they feed?

name: Daryabadi
text: And they have therefrom other benefits and drinks. Will they not then give thanks?

name: Daryabadi
text: And they have taken beside Allah gods, hoping that haply they may be succoured.

name: Daryabadi
text: They are not able to give them succour; whereas they shall be against them host brought forward.

name: Daryabadi
text: So let not their speech grieve thee. Verily We! We know whatsoever they keep secret and whatsoever they make known.

name: Daryabadi
text: Beholdest not man that We have created him from a sperm? Yet lo! he is a manifest disputer?

name: Daryabadi
text: And he propoundeth for us a similitude, and forgetteth his creation, He saith: who shall quicken the bones when they are decayed?

name: Daryabadi
text: Say thou:" He shall quicken them Who brought them forth for the first time, and He is of every kind of creation the Knower!

name: Daryabadi
text: Who giveth you out of the green tree fire, and lo! ye kindle therewith.

name: Daryabadi
text: Is not He who created the heavens and the earth able to create the like of these? Yea! He is the Supreme Creator, the Knower.

name: Daryabadi
text: His affair, when He intendeth a thing, is only that He saith Unto it: be, and it becometh.

name: Daryabadi
text: Wherefore hallowed be He in whose hand is the governance of everything, and Unto whom ye shall be returned.
